co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task
Class TaskService

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.coopr.scheduler.task.TaskService

public class TaskService
extends Object

Service for performing operations on ClusterTasks.

Method Detail

getRetryTask

public List<ClusterTask> getRetryTask(ClusterTask task)
Get tasks that must be run in order to retry the given task that failed on a given node in a given cluster. For example, to retry a service installation, we just retry the task again. However, to retry a node confirm, we need to first delete the created node, create another node, and then confirm that node.

Parameters:
task - Task that failed and must be retried.
Returns:
List of tasks that must be executed to retry the given failed task.

startTask

public void startTask(ClusterTask clusterTask)
               throws IOException
Starts a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.IN_PROGRESS and the submit time to the current timestamp.

Parameters:
clusterTask - Task to start.
Throws:
IOException

dropTask

public void dropTask(ClusterTask clusterTask)
              throws IOException
Drop a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.DROPPED and the status time to the current timestamp. Tasks can be dropped if there is no longer any point in executing them. For example, if another task in the same stage has failed, the entire job cannot complete so there is no point in executing any unexecuted task in the job.

Parameters:
clusterTask - Task to drop.
Throws:
IOException

failTask

public void failTask(ClusterTask clusterTask,
                     int status)
              throws IOException
Fail a task by setting the status of the task to ClusterTask.Status.FAILED and the status time to the current timestamp and the status code to the given code.

Parameters:
clusterTask - Task to fail.
status - Status code of the failed task.
Throws:
IOException

                  throws IOException

status - Status code of the completed task.
